data.enText: part of place

data.chText: （地方、城市、国家、世界的）地区，地域
data.enText: part of a place, town, etc., or a region of a country or the world
mountainous/desert areas

data.chText: 农村 / 城市地区；内城区
data.enText: rural/urban/inner-city areas
There is heavy traffic in the downtown area tonight.

data.chText: 她非常了解这地区的情况。
data.enText: She knows the local area very well.
John is the London area manager.

data.chText: 飞机失事残骸散落在一个广阔地域。
data.enText: Wreckage from the plane was scattered over a wide area .

data.chText: 农场和周围地区遭洪水淹没。
data.enText: The farm and surrounding area was flooded.

data.chText: （房间、建筑物、处所划为某用途的）地方，场地，区
data.enText: a part of a room, building or particular space that is used for a special purpose
the hotel reception area

data.chText: 游戏场地；停车场；用餐处
data.enText: a play/parking/dining area
particular place
a particular place on an object

data.chText: 把光标移至电脑屏幕的空区。
data.enText: Move the cursor to a blank area of the computer screen.

data.chText: 肿瘤尚未扩散到身体其他部位。
data.enText: The tumour had not spread to other areas of the body.
subject/activity
a particular subject or activity, or an aspect of it
the areas of training and development

data.chText: 财务是马克负责的范围。
data.enText: Finance is Mark's area.

data.chText: 健身俱乐部是近年来发展迅速的领域。
data.enText: The big growth area of recent years has been in health clubs.
measurement
the amount of space covered by a flat surface or piece of land, described as a measurement
the area of a triangle

data.chText: 这个房间面积是12平方米。
data.enText: The room is 12 square metres in area.
football

data.chText: 他就在禁区外边拔脚射门。
data.enText: He shot from just outside the area.

means: (房间、建筑物、处所划为某用途的)场地

ex.chText: 她负债已达5万美元。
ex.enText: She is in debt to the extent of 50,000 dollars.

ex.chText: 我们对他知识之渊博感到惊奇。
ex.enText: We were amazed at the extent of his knowledge.

ex.chText: 生意如此惨淡，公司只好停业。
ex.enText: Business declined to such an extent that the firm had to close.

synonyms.bx: 指事物的大小、面积、范围或重要性、严重性等的程度。

ex.chText: 这门课程涵盖心理学领域。
ex.enText: This course covers the psychological area.

ex.chText: 她想参与他生活的方方面面。
ex.enText: She wants to be involved in every area of his life.

synonyms.bx: 指学科、话题、事件等涉及的范围。

ex.chText: 这超出了我的能力范围。
ex.enText: It's beyond the bounds of my ability.

ex.chText: 知识是没有穷尽的。
ex.enText: Knowledge knows no bounds.

synonyms.bx: 指事情的极限或可以接受的范围，常用于比喻。

ex.chText: 这片森林覆盖范围很广。
ex.enText: The breadth of the forest is very large.

ex.chText: 我们需要拓宽知识范围。
ex.enText: We need to develop the breadth of our knowledge.

synonyms.bx: 多指事物的宽度或范围，强调广泛性。

ex.chText: 商业区/停车区/住宅区
ex.enText: a commercial/parking/residential zone

ex.chText: 危险区/安全区
ex.enText: a danger/safety zone

ex.chText: 地震带
ex.enText: earthquake zones

ex.chText: 他们正把部队调离战区。
ex.enText: They are pulling their troops out of the battle zone.

ex.chText: 中国的大部分地区处于温带。
ex.enText: Most of China is in the temperate zone.

synonyms.bx: 指具有某种区别性特征而被划分出来的区域、地带；用作科技术语时，多指地球上依据温度划分的气候带。

ex.chText: 在澳大利亚还有大片地区至今荒无人烟。
ex.enText: There're large areas in Australia still unpopulated.

ex.chText: 此处禁止停车。
ex.enText: Parking is prohibited in this area.

ex.chText: 我们将在旅馆接待处碰面。
ex.enText: We will meet in the hotel reception area.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指国家、市镇等的区域，或建筑、处所等中作特定用途的场地。

ex.chText: 玉米/森林/绿色地带
ex.enText: the corn/forest/green belt

ex.chText: 《圣经》地带（指美国南部新教教义极具影响的地区）
ex.enText: the Bible Belt

ex.chText: 防护林带能减弱风力。
ex.enText: The shelter belt breaks the force of the wind.

synonyms.bx: 指具有某种特色或某类人居住的地区或地带。

ex.chText: 你知道这个地区的邮政编码吗？
ex.enText: Do you know the postal code of this district?

ex.chText: 北京最热闹的商业区是王府井大街一带。
ex.enText: The busiest shopping district in Beijing is around Wangfujing Street.

synonyms.bx: 多指由政府等机构出于行政管理等目的而明确划分的地区。

ex.chText: 伦敦及（英国）其他各地区
ex.enText: London and the regions

ex.chText: 这些植物生长在阿尔卑斯山区。
ex.enText: These plants grow in the Alpine region.

ex.chText: 山区居民的生活比过去幸福多了。
ex.enText: The inhabitants of mountainous regions live more happily than ever before.

ex.chText: 我去过西班牙的巴斯克区。
ex.enText: I have visited the Basque region of Spain.

synonyms.bx: 通常指界线不明的较大地区或一国的行政分区；the regions 则指某国除首都以外的所有区域。

ex.chText: 我的家乡位于一片美丽的土地上。
ex.enText: My hometown is located on a beautiful stretch of land.

ex.chText: 这一河段少有船只经过。
ex.enText: Ships are rarely seen on this stretch of the river.

ex.chText: 除了近在眼前的一小段路之外，她什么也看不见。
ex.enText: She could see nothing but a small stretch of road just ahead.

synonyms.bx: 尤指长而窄的一片地域或水域。

tr: a part of a structure having some specific characteristic or function
example: the spacious cooking area provided plenty of room for servants

tr: the extent of a 2-dimensional surface enclosed within a boundary
example: it was about 500 square feet in area

tr: a part of an animal that has a special function or is supplied by a given artery or nerve

example: it was his area of specialization

tr: a particular geographical region of indefinite boundary (usually serving some special purpose or distinguished by its people or culture or geography)
a particular environment or walk of life
example: it was a closed area of employment

value.def: An area is a particular part of a town, a country, a region, or the world.

example.ex: ...the large number of community groups in the area...
60 years ago half the French population still lived in rural areas.
example.tran: 60年前有一半法国人仍然生活在乡村地区。

example.ex: ...mountainous areas of Europe, Asia, North and South America.
example.tran: 欧洲、亚洲、南北美洲的山区

value.def: Your area is the part of a town, country, or region where you live. An organization's area is the part of a town, country, or region that it is responsible for.

example.ex: Local authorities have been responsible for the running of schools in their areas...
example.tran: 地方当局一直负责管理本地区的学校。

example.ex: If there is an election in your area, you should go and vote.
example.tran: 如果你所居住的地区进行选举，你应该去参加投票。

value.def: A particular area is a piece of land or part of a building that is used for a particular activity.

example.ex: ...the main check-in area located in Terminal 1.
example.tran: 位于1号候机厅的主检票区

value.def: An area is a particular place on a surface or object, for example on your body.

example.ex: You will notice that your baby has two soft areas on the top of his head.
example.tran: 你会注意到你的宝宝头顶上有两处柔软的地方。

value.tran: （某一表面或物体上的）区；（身体上的）部分

value.def: The area of a surface such as a piece of land is the amount of flat space or ground that it covers, measured in square units.

example.ex: The islands cover a total area of 625.6 square kilometers...
example.tran: 这些岛屿总面积为625.6平方公里。

example.ex: Although large in area, the flat did not have many rooms.
example.tran: 这套公寓虽然面积很大，但并没有太多房间。

value.def: You can use area to refer to a particular subject or topic, or to a particular part of a larger, more general situation or activity.

example.ex: ...the politically sensitive area of old age pensions.
example.tran: 有关养老金的政治敏感话题

example.ex: ...the internationalization of the economy and all other areas of society...
example.tran: 社会的经济和其他领域的国际化

example.ex: She wants to be involved in every area of your life.
example.tran: 她想参与入你生活中的方方面面。

value.def: On a football pitch, the area is the same as the penalty area.

trans: 研究领域；研究方向；主要研究领域；研究区；研究領域
海域；海区；同一海域；海洋区域
陆地区域；合模面面积；接触面积
局域网，本地网(缩略形式为 LAN)
比表面积；比表面；粉末比表面；表面积；骨料比表面积
展开面积；经济发达地区；开发地区
水域面积；水域；水面积；面积
